toolsAvailable: MergeTool - Combine multiple PDF files (SEO: merge PDF, combine PDF)
SplitTool - Split PDF into separate files (SEO: split PDF, extract pages)
CompressionTool - Reduce PDF file size (SEO: compress PDF, reduce size)
AddTextTool - Add text to PDF (SEO: add text PDF, PDF editor)
WatermarkTool - Add watermarks to PDF (SEO: PDF watermark, protect PDF)
RotateTool - Rotate PDF pages (SEO: rotate PDF, fix orientation)
ExtractPagesTool - Extract specific pages (SEO: extract pages, PDF splitter)
ExtractTextTool - Extract text from PDF (SEO: PDF to text, extract text)
PdfToImageTool - Convert PDF to images (SEO: PDF to JPG, PDF to PNG)
